short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add faceit player infos on Steam profile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate Faceit player statistics and information into your Steam profile to showcase your gaming achievements and performance. Display detailed stats such as your Faceit ranking, match history, win/loss record, and other relevant data directly on your Steam profile. This integration allows you to highlight your competitive gaming prowess and connect with other players who share your passion for Faceit tournaments and matches. Enhance your Steam profile by adding a comprehensive overview of your Faceit activities, making it easier for friends and fellow gamers to see your progress and accomplishments in the gaming community.
